tool_description: [Geotagging API](https://geotagging.ai/) provides a simple interface to text-based geolocation. The API takes texts on the input, processes them with the latest Deep Learning geolocation models and returns predicted locations on the output. Test the API to obtain geolocation data, build geodashboards, and run live analytics.
name: Geotagging AI
title: Geotagging AI

api_list.name: Main
api_list.description: Main processing endpoint for public requests
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://geotagging-ai1.p.rapidapi.com/geotagging"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "geotagging-ai1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://geotagging-ai1.p.rapidapi.com/geotagging"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "geotagging-ai1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
